key_themes: Slavery, Historical Accuracy, Political Commentary, Character Development (Cinque), Direction, Plot Coherence
named_entities: Amistad, Steven Spielberg, Martin Van Buren, John Quincy Adams, Anthony Hopkins, Djimon Hounsou, Matthew McConaughey, David Franzoni, Queen Isabella of Spain, Contact
highlighted_quotes: "Amistad" is three four star films edited into one. | the story comes through with enough raw emotional power that it is still a very good film, and thus i recommend it to anyone who can handle the disturbing imagery.
